lines.gurmukhi: kwhU dsw ky pvn gvn kY brKw hY; kwhU dsw ky pvn bwdr iblwq hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as wind blowing from a particular direction causes rain while another direction blows the clouds away.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iksy idSw dI pOx clx nwl qwˆ brKw ho pYˆdI hY qy iksy idSw dI pOx nwl b`dl auf jwieAw krdy hn, mIˆh pYxw bMd ho jwieAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kwhU jl pwn kIey rhq Arog dohI; kwhU jl pwn ibAwpy ibRQw ibllwq hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as drinking some water keeps the body healthy while some other water causes one to fall sick. It troubles the patient no end.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iksy jl dy pIiqAwˆ srIr nvwˆ nroAw rihMdw hY, Aqy iksy jl pIn qoˆ ibRQw ibAwpY rog aultw Dw auiTAw krdw qy roxw pYˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kwhU igRh kI Agin pwk swk isiD krY; kwhU igRh kI Agin Bvnu jrwq hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as the fire of a house helps in cooking but the fire raged in another house burns the house to ashes'

lines.gurmukhi: kwhU kI sMgq imil jIvn mukiq huie; kwhU kI sMgiq imil jmupuir jwq hY [549[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly someone's company liberates, while other's company leads one to hell.  (549)
